00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import rospy
00004 from math import pow
00005 from math import pi
00006 from math import sin
00007 from math import cos
00008 from last_letter.srv import *
00009 import tf.transformations
00010 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3
00011 
00012 
00013 def calc_torque_callback(req):
00014 
00015         states = req.states
00016         inputs = req.inputs
00017 
00018         #Request air data from getAirData server
00019         airdata = getAirData(states)
00020         airspeed = airdata.airspeed
00021         alpha = airdata.alpha
00022         beta = airdata.beta
00023         #rospy.logerr('airspeed:%g, alpha:%g, beta:%g',airspeed, alpha, beta)#
00024 
00025         #Split Control input values
00026         deltaa = inputs[0]
00027         deltae = inputs[1]
00028         deltat = inputs[2]
00029         deltar = inputs[3]
00030 
00031         #Read from parameter server
00032         rho = rospy.get_param('world/rho')
00033         c = rospy.get_param('airframe/c')
00034         b = rospy.get_param('airframe/b')
00035         s = rospy.get_param('airframe/s')
00036         c_l_0 = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_l_0')
00037         c_l_b = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_l_b')
00038         c_l_p = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_l_p')
00039         c_l_r = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_l_r')
00040         c_l_deltaa = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_l_deltaa')
00041         c_l_deltar = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_l_deltar')
00042         c_m_0 = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_m_0')
00043         c_m_a = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_m_a')
00044         c_m_q = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_m_q')
00045         c_m_deltae = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_m_deltae')
00046         c_n_0 = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_n_0')
00047         c_n_b = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_n_b')
00048         c_n_p = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_n_p')
00049         c_n_r = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_n_r')
00050         c_n_deltaa = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_n_deltaa')
00051         c_n_deltar = rospy.get_param('airframe/c_n_deltar')
00052         k_t_p = rospy.get_param('motor/k_t_p')
00053         k_omega = rospy.get_param('motor/k_omega')
00054         
00055         #Read angular rates
00056         (p, q, r) = (states.twist.twist.angular.x, states.twist.twist.angular.y, states.twist.twist.angular.z)
00057         
00058         #Calculate Aerodynamic torque
00059         qbar = 1.0/2*rho*pow(airspeed,2)*s #Calculate dynamic pressure
00060         if airspeed==0:
00061                 (la, ma, na) = (0, 0, 0)
00062         else:
00063                 la = qbar*b*(c_l_0 + c_l_b*beta + c_l_p*b*p/(2*airspeed) + c_l_r*b*r/(2*airspeed) + c_l_deltaa*deltaa + c_l_deltar*deltar)
00064                 ma = qbar*c*(c_m_0 + c_m_a*alpha + c_m_q*c*q/(2*airspeed) + c_m_deltae*deltae)
00065                 na = qbar*b*(c_n_0 + c_n_b*beta + c_n_p*b*p/(2*airspeed) + c_n_r*b*r/(2*airspeed) + c_n_deltaa*deltaa + c_n_deltar*deltar)
00066         
00067         #Calculate Thrust torque
00068         lm = -k_t_p*pow(k_omega*deltat,2)
00069         mm = 0
00070         nm = 0  
00071 
00072         #Sum torques
00073         l = la + lm
00074         m = ma + mm
00075         n = na + nm     
00076 
00077         response = Vector3(l, m, n)
00078         
00079         return response
00080 
00081 def getAirData(Odo):
00082     rospy.wait_for_service('calc_air_data')
00083     try:
00084         calcAirData = rospy.ServiceProxy('calc_air_data',calc_air_data)
00085         return calcAirData(Odo.twist.twist.linear)
00086     except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00087                 rospy.logerr("Service call failed: %s"%e)
00088 
00089 def getLiftAlpha(alpha):
00090         rospy.wait_for_service('c_lift_a')
00091         try:
00092                 calcLiftAlpha = rospy.SericeProxy('c_lift_a',c_lift_a)
00093                 return calcLiftAlpha(alpha)
00094         except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00095                 rospy.logerr("Service call failed: %s"%e)
00096 
00097 def getDragAlpha(alpha):
00098         rospy.wait_for_service('c_drag_a')
00099         try:
00100                 calcDragAlpha = rospy.SericeProxy('c_drag_a',c_drag_a)
00101                 return calcDragAlpha(alpha)
00102         except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00103                 rospy.logerr("Service call failed: %s"%e)
00104 
00105 
00106 if __name__=='__main__':
00107         try:
00108                 rospy.init_node('calc_torque_server')
00109                 s = rospy.Service('calc_torque', calc_torque, calc_torque_callback)
00110                 rospy.loginfo('calc_torque service running')
00111                 while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00112                         rospy.spin()
00113                                 
00114         except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
00115                 pass
